subject: Re: Unit test java documentation
msgSnippet: ... Ya.. me too.  I never put comments in my test code... ever... I hardly put them in my production code.  Keep it clean, keep it clear. Remeber, long method
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Bob Koss <koss@o...> wrote:
>
> I'm curious what kind of comments you add (or documentation you
> produce). The names of my test methods describe what they do and I
> never felt the need for any more documenting.

Ya.. me too. I never put comments in my test code... ever... I hardly
put them in my production code. Keep it clean, keep it clear.

Remeber, long method names are ok... especially in test code.

Dave
